abstract: Lions Gate Entertainment and MGM have been holding merger talks, but it is not clear that a deal will emerge, people briefed on the matter told DealBook.
snippet: Lions Gate Entertainment and MGM have been holding merger talks, but it is not clear that a deal will emerge, people briefed on the matter told DealBook.
lead_paragraph: Lions Gate Entertainment and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer have been holding merger talks, but it is not clear that a deal will emerge, people briefed on the matter told DealBook on Thursday.

headline.main: Lions Gate and MGM Hold Talks on Potential Deal

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
